meanings.definition: The hollow beneath the junction of the arm and shoulder.
meanings.sent1: She raised her arms, and the deodorant stick glided smoothly under her armpits.
meanings.sent2: After exercising, it's important to wash your armpits to prevent body odor.
meanings.sent3: The ticklish sensation in his armpits made him squirm during the tickle fight.
meanings.sent4: The armpits of the mountain were where the snow collected, forming a beautiful white patch.
meanings.sent5: The baby giggled as her mother blew raspberries on her armpits, causing her to squirm with delight.

meanings.definition: The part of the body where the arm joins the shoulder.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his armpits after lifting heavy boxes all day.
meanings.sent2: The basketball player raised his arms, showing off his muscular armpits.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue hidden in the suspect's armpits, leading to a breakthrough in the case.
meanings.sent4: Her armpits were like two warm havens, providing comfort when she hugged her loved ones.
meanings.sent5: The sunburn on his armpits reminded him to apply sunscreen more diligently next time.
